invocations.description: Sets the visibility of User Options' widget with name widgetname. If state is false, hides it; otherwise, displays it.
invocations.ex:
if getuseroption('vocation') == 'Knight' then
	showuseroption('weapontype', true)
else
	showuseroption('weapontype', false)
end
invocations.exDescription: Will check if the vocation combobox has the value 'knight' selected. If so, shows 'weapontype' combobox, else hides it.
